title: Boutique Lodge Escape in Ireland’s Countryside with Decadent Dining Inclusions
description: The rugged green beauty of the Emerald Isle awaits on this exceptional getaway - fit for royalty: venture to the heart of the lush countryside for a romantic stay at The Lodge at Ashford Castle. Sitting peacefully within the magnificent 350-acre estate of Ashford Castle and overlooking the magical Lough Corrib, you will experience a quintessential Irish escape complete with daily breakfast, a three-course dinner during your stay and credit for the property’s 9-hole course, designed by renowned Irish golf architect Eddie Hackett.
offer_address: Ashford Castle Estate, Lisloughrey, Cong, Co. Mayo, Ireland
